result.title: TCO17 Marathon Round 2
result.content: The second round of TCO17 Marathon Competition AbstractWars started today. It will run for two weeks, and top 30 competitors will get points which then will be converted to t-shirts and trips to the finals (here are the rules). Besides, this round will have two Data Science Weekly Challenges associated with it (which I still have to come up with). I am the writer, enjoy! :-)
